DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Mulago Teaching Hospital . Patients come ER orthopaedic injury approach . If patient consent part study , complete questionnaire . Participation study end soon questionnaire complete .
DOC.detailed_description: All patient recruit orthopedics inpatient ward emergency department Mulago National Referral Hospital . Only patient sustain orthopedics injury include study , severity record future reference . No Protected Health Information ( PHI ) collect throughout study . Steps 1 . Identify patient Mulago Teaching Hospital 2 . Enrollment patient survey study 3 . Administer survey patient 1st meet 4 . Administer survey doctor-in-charge ? 5 . Compilations survey result excel spreadsheet . Participants assign ID . The study team intend collect PHI . 6 . Statistical Analysis .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subject male female 18 year old old . patient present Mulago National Referral Hospital orthopedics trauma injury regardless age gender . Exclusion criterion : patient present condition orthopedics related injury may require long term care . Some example head injury lead long term damage , loss sight , etc .
